WorkItem.Description:
It is not possible to associate two entities of the same type.

The Code looks like (Soap)

"<a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>",
 "<b:key>Relationship</b:key>",
 "<b:value i:type='a:Relationship'>",
 __"<a:PrimaryEntityRole i:nil='true' />",__
 "<a:SchemaName>", relationshipName, "</a:SchemaName>",
 "</b:value>",
 "</a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>",

but it should be somethink like

"<a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>",
"<b:key>Relationship</b:key>",
"<b:value i:type='a:Relationship'>",
 __"<a:PrimaryEntityRole>Referenced</a:PrimaryEntityRole>",__
"<a:SchemaName>", relationshipName, "</a:SchemaName>",
"</b:value>",
 "</a:KeyValuePairOfstringanyType>",

Comments.Message:
Hi There.

Thanks for the feedback. I will have a look at the issue and do some testing. 

Kind Regards,
Jaimie
